archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of Manton Davis Pertaining to the Inter-Allied Rhineland High Commission (Manton Davis)
1919-1923

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Manton Davis Pertaining to the Inter-Allied Rhineland High Commission (Manton Davis), Accession #1735, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Manton Davis was the American legal advisor to the Inter-Allied Rhineland High Commission.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Davis' papers contain the ordinances and instructions pertaining to the military occupation of the territories of the Rhine; notes on the meetings of the commission; and reports of Henry T. Allen to the U.S. Secretary of State re the occupation and the work of the commission.

did.unittitle: Ordinances and Instructions, Inter-Allied Rhineland High Comission 1919 Jun 28 - 1922 Sep
Meetings of the High Comission, Inter-Allied Rhineland High Comission 1919 Dec 31 - 1920 Jul 24
Meetings of the Legal Committee, Inter-Allied Rhineland High Comission 1920 Feb 13 - 1920 Jul 17
Index to State Department Reports of the Inter-Allied Rhineland High Comission, Books A, B, C, and D 1920 Aug 23 - 1922 Mar 21
Book A - State Department Reports 1920 Aug 23 - 1920 Dec 27
Book B - State Department Reports 1921 Jan 17 - 1921 Jun 28
Book C - State Department Reports 1921 July 5 - 1921 Dec 29
Book D - State Department Reports 1922 Jan 5 - 1922 Mar 21
Book F - State Department Reports, w/an "Annex to Letter dated August 6, 1921, Book 'C'" 1923 Jan 1 - 1923 Feb 6
